config.title: Provider Addresses
config.content:
*indicates required field.

This is the physical location where services will be rendered (or in the case of mobile services where management/supervision occurs). P.O. Box or P.O. Drawer is not acceptable as a Street address.

config.name: primaryAddress:street
config.label: Street
config.description: The number and street name where a person or organization can be found.

config.name: primaryAddress:street2
config.label: Street Line 2
config.description: The number and street name where a person or organization can be found.

config.name: primaryAddress:city
config.label: City
config.description: City associated with the provider address field.

config.name: primaryAddress:stateProvince
config.label: State / Province
config.description: The ISO 3166-2 Two Character Code associated with the State/Province/Region of the applicable Country.

config.name: primaryAddress:zipCode
config.label: Zip Code / Postal Code
config.description: System of postal-zone codes (zip stands for 'zone improvement plan') introduced in the U.S. in 1963 to improve mail delivery and exploit electronic reading and sorting capabilities. If zip +4 code is used, place a hyphen between the Zip Code and Postal code fields.

config.name: primaryAddress:providerContactName
config.label: Provider Contact Name
config.description: Complete legal name of institution, corporate entity, practice or individual provider.

config.name: primaryAddress:providerContactEmailAddress1
config.label: Email Address
config.description: An electronic mail address at which the health plan might contact the provider.

config.name: mapPrimaryToBilling
config.label: Primary Address is the same as Billing Address

config.label: Pay-To Address is the same as Primary Practice Address
